feed.title: Nextcloud News Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • build(deps-dev): Bump typescript from 5.7.2 to 5.7.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3044
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.19.1 to 8.20.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3050
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.19.1 to 8.20.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3051
  • build(deps): Bump fivefilters/readability.php from 3.3.0 to 3.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3049
  • build(deps-dev): Bump ts-loader from 9.5.1 to 9.5.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3047
  • build(deps-dev): Bump squizlabs/php_codesniffer from 3.11.2 to 3.11.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3062
  • build(deps-dev): Bump doctrine/dbal from 3.9.3 to 3.9.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3054
  • Update webpack dependency and cleanup unneeded devDependencies by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3065
  • Make use of stylelint in vue files and update @nextcloud/stylelint-config to 3.0.1 by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3070
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/webpack-env from 1.18.6 to 1.18.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3071
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/lodash from 4.17.14 to 4.17.15 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3072
  • fix: show error on folders only if at least one feed has more than eight errors by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3073
  • User documentation by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3075
  • Improve mobile view by using horizontal-split mobile layout by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3046
  • Limit the max nextUpdateTime delay to 24 hour by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3074
  • Release 25.2.1-beta.1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3077
  • Fix build pipeline by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3078
  • Release 25.2.1-beta.2 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3079
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/webpack-env from 1.18.7 to 1.18.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3076
  • Fix bats integration opml test by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3084
  • build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.22.0 to 8.23.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3083
  • Release 25.2.1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3088

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.2.0...25.2.1

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updates for php 8.4 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3038
  • Enable support for Nextcloud 31 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3089
  • Release 25.3.0-beta.1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3090
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @nextcloud/eslint-config from 8.4.1 to 8.4.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3091
  • build(deps-dev): Bump ts-jest from 29.2.5 to 29.2.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3094
  • build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/event-bus from 3.3.1 to 3.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3103
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/lodash from 4.17.15 to 4.17.16 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3104
  • replace net_url2 with guzzle by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3105
  • Release 25.3.0-beta.2 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3106
  • small fix for #3105 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3107
  • build(deps): Bump fivefilters/readability.php from 3.3.1 to 3.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3110
  • Release 25.3.0 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3112

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.2.1...25.3.0

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • build(deps): Bump axios from 1.7.9 to 1.8.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3111
  • fix 3114, proxy url without schema by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3115
  • build(deps-dev): Bump squizlabs/php_codesniffer from 3.11.3 to 3.12.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3118
  • build(deps): Bump @babel/helpers from 7.26.9 to 7.26.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3119
  • build(deps-dev): Bump ts-jest from 29.2.6 to 29.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3124
  • fix: sort feeds case-insensitive by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3125
  • Release 25.3.1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3127

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.3.0...25.3.1

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 26.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • build(deps): Bump guzzlehttp/psr7 from 2.7.0 to 2.7.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3128
  • build(deps-dev): Bump ts-jest from 29.3.0 to 29.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3132
  • builddeps: update @nextcloud/vue 8.24.0 by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3134
  • build(deps-dev): Bump squizlabs/php_codesniffer from 3.12.0 to 3.12.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3137
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @nextcloud/webpack-vue-config from 6.2.0 to 6.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3138
  • build(deps-dev): Bump squizlabs/php_codesniffer from 3.12.1 to 3.12.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3140
  • build(deps-dev): Bump ts-jest from 29.3.1 to 29.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3139
  • Switch to useHotKey from @nextcloud/vue by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3142
  • Preparation for the upcoming nextcloud/vue v9 update by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3141
  • build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.24.0 to 8.25.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3143
  • build(deps): Bump @babel/runtime from 7.26.7 to 7.27.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3144
  • build(deps-dev): Bump http-proxy-middleware from 2.0.7 to 2.0.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3145
  • Drop support for Nextcloud 29 by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3146
  • fix: use @nextcloud/moment for formatted date strings by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3149
  • deps: update nextcloud/vue 8.26.0 by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3150
  • build(deps): Bump fivefilters/readability.php from 3.3.2 to 3.3.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3151
  • build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/dialogs from 6.1.1 to 6.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3152
  • Rework VirtualScroll in view of the vue3 migration by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3153
  • Release 26.0.0-beta.1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3154
  • fix: item list not updated by automatic or manual refresh by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3155
  • Release 26.0.0-beta.2 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3156
  • build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/moment from 1.3.2 to 1.3.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3157
  • build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.26.0 to 8.26.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3158
  • refactor: use html5 history mode by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3159
  • build(deps-dev): Bump squizlabs/php_codesniffer from 3.12.2 to 3.13.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3162
  • build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/auth from 2.4.0 to 2.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3160
  • build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/dialogs from 6.2.0 to 6.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3161
  • Vue3 migration by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3163
  • Release 26.0.0-beta.3 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3164
  • build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/vue from 9.0.0-rc.0 to 9.0.0-rc.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3165
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.15.17 to 22.15.18 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3166
  • build(deps): Bump vue from 3.5.13 to 3.5.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3167
  • fix: possible race conditions when switching routes by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3168
  • cleanup: remove old js, css and templates folder and unused images by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3170
  • feat: show feed info table during opml import by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3169
  • Release 26.0.0-beta.4 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3172
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.15.18 to 22.15.19 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3173
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @vitest/coverage-istanbul from 3.1.3 to 3.1.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3176
  • Actions dependabot groups by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3179
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.15.19 to 22.15.21 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3180
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/lodash from 4.17.16 to 4.17.17 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3181
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @nextcloud/stylelint-config from 3.0.1 to 3.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3184
  • fix: stylelint warnings from update @nextcloud/stylelint-config 3.1.0 by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3187
  • build(deps): Bump R0Wi/nextcloud-appstore-push-action from 1.0.3 to 1.0.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3182
  • fix: first selected item can disappear from the list by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3178
  • feat: show intro and date if enough space in compact mode by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3186
  • Release 26.0.0-beta.5 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3189
  • build(deps): Bump vue from 3.5.14 to 3.5.15 in the vue group by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3190
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.15.21 to 22.15.23 in the types group by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3192
  • deps-dev: update @nextcloud/vue 9.0.0-rc.2 by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3193
  • fix: close action menu before renaming or deleting navigation item by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3194
  • Release 26.0.0 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3188

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.3.1...26.0.0

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 26.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.15.23 to 22.15.24 in the types group by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3197
  • build(deps): Bump vue from 3.5.15 to 3.5.16 in the vue group by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3196
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.15.24 to 22.15.27 in the types group by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3198
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 22.15.27 to 22.15.29 in the types group by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3201
  • build(deps-dev): Bump the vite group with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3202
  • refactor: Feed item list filtering and sorting by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3200
  • fix: enable title scrolling in compact mode on mobile only by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3205
  • fix: prevent incorrect "mark read on scroll" behavior after route change by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3206
  • update all actions in the release workflow by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3195
  • Release 26.0.1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3207

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/26.0.0...26.0.1
